BackstoryDef.title: Goa'uld servant
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Born into the shadow of a self-proclaimed god, [PAWN_nameDef] spent their childhood groveling at the feet of glowing-eyed overlords. Polishing armor, fetching symbiote snacks, and learning never to make eye contact. A glamorous upbringing, really.

BackstoryDef.title: Temple Acolyte
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Raised in a pyramid temple deep in the jungle, [PAWN_nameDef] memorized endless chants, rituals, and the importance of never asking “who made the gods?”. They spent most of their youth polishing golden idols and translating "divine" gibberish.

BackstoryDef.title: Larval Host
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: From a young age, [PAWN_nameDef] was chosen to incubate larval symbiotes—a sacred and gooey duty. Most of their childhood was spent in medical labs, nutrient baths, and dealing with chronic stomach growls that weren’t entirely theirs.

BackstoryDef.title: Tok’ra infiltrator
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] walked the razor’s edge between gods and rebellion. Posing as a loyal servant of the Goa’uld, they passed secrets to the Tok’ra network by night. Their past is a tangle of false identities, whispered codes, and narrow escapes.

BackstoryDef.title: System Lord’s clerk
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Not all served the Goa’uld with a staff weapon. [PAWN_nameDef] managed supply chains, tribute tallies, and the divine calendar. Accidentally miscounting a shipment of Naquadah often meant a swift trip to the sarcophagus—if lucky.

BackstoryDef.title: First Prime
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: As the First Prime of a System Lord, [PAWN_nameDef] served as enforcer, executioner, and occasional motivational speaker (with staff weapon). Feared by allies and enemies alike, they carried out divine will with zeal—and very little paperwork.

BackstoryDef.title: Jaffa
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was bred for strength, loyalty, and dramatic entrances. As a Jaffa, they carried a larval symbiote and a massive chip on their shoulder. Service to the Goa’uld was mandatory; personal opinions were not.

BackstoryDef.title: Goa'uld slave
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Chained by fate and fashion, [PAWN_nameDef] served the Goa’uld as a nameless, faceless laborer. Forbidden from fighting, learning, or even dreaming too loudly. Their daily highlight? Not being vaporized.
